Name: Christmopolitan
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and red currants sprig.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: A Christmas cocktail created in October 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England. Cosmopolitan Cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Christmopolitan contains 178 calories
